hello!

I'm Jam, a student developer from Singapore. I'm interested in front-end development, history, palaeontology, video games, crochet and knitting.

This is my little corner on the web. It's a work-in-progress, so expect a lot of changes along the way.

I'm autistic, chronically ill and hearing-impaired, and these things colour my experience of the world.

You can find me elsewhere on the Fediverse or on Matrix.

Hold the Girl, by Rina Sawayama
